Title: The Only Good Spider
Description:
$p, if we don't stem the tide of nerubians climbing up to us, nothing else will matter.

Their numbers are just too great.

We need to delay their onslaught to buy the people of Hallowfall time to prepare. The wall still serves as a very effective chokepoint.

Do what you can to thin their numbers.
CompletionText: $n, every nerubian you kill here could mean a life saved in Hallowfall, and aids the chances of our own success.
RewardText: This is a good start. There are still many more nerubians coming from below, but we must turn our attention to those already inside Hallowfall.
